titles.title: Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund Enhancement Act of 2004
To amend the Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Act of 1990 to authorize additional appropriations for the Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund, and for other purposes.
Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund Enhancement Act of 2004
Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund Enhancement Act of 2004
Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund Enhancement Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Mr. Flake moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2121.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund Enhancement Act of 2004 - Authorizes additional appropriations for the Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund.
